name: HEARTLIGHT (itch)
description:
fight through a post-human (not so desolate) world with easy to pick up and play action combat while meeting new friends everywhere you go.

___________

take your friends you've made out on adventures to learn about their lives and who they really are while camping under the stars, who knows maybe they have some things they can teach you as well.

___________

find and customize new weapons, skills and equipment that that allows for unique play styles.

if you are interested in learning more about the design and the future of HEARTLIGHT I recommend you read this!

If you want to contribute to the future of Heartlight considering donating, subscribing, or joining the discussion :3

Patreon • Twitter • Discord

 

this game is still highly in development.  expect things such as long load times, occasional frame rate drops and the occasional bug. 

___________

a controller is HIGHLY recommended. currently all UI are set to  correspond to PlayStation, please use your best judgement if using another gamepad.

___________

all levels are currently only in a gray box level state.
